channel.title: Item Trade (Mailing Items)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Item Trade (Mailing Items)" - Looking for 2 Monsterdrops

item.title: Re: Item Trade (Mailing Items)
item.content:encoded: i think it looks like a little more then the +10% gen ranking item, since gen is the main form for farming money

item.title: Re: Item Trade (Mailing Items)
item.content:encoded: Anyone willing to trade any super rare for a K-dogs Headband?

item.title: Re: Item Trade (Mailing Items)
item.content:encoded: Oh I don't know. I think the above list is the approximate value of one of the almost-a-drawback monster drops. Perfect Hair comes to mind. (This is not an offer. I don't have one Perfect Hair, let alone a spare.)

item.title: Re: Item Trade (Mailing Items)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, but none of what he offered are even remotely close to being worth a monster drop. For a monster drop, he'd need to be willing to trade either another monster drop or another very rare item.

item.title: Re: Item Trade (Mailing Items)
item.content:encoded: There's always the traditional method of joining the same village and making the trade through the Storehouse.

item.title: Re: Item Trade (Mailing Items)
item.content:encoded: You are aware that you can only trade one thing a day, right? So if you want to trade a bunch of small items it will take a while. If this is your offer, it would take over half a year to complete this trade.

item.title: Item Trade (Mailing Items)
item.content:encoded:
Need 2 Drops, for my Alts, it does not matter wich ones !

Iam willig to trade for it:

Ebony Sand: 6
Glowing Goo: 18
The Right Stuff: 4
Monochrome Flower: 8
Nightshade: 5
Billy Bucket: 33
Super Potion: 1
Glowing Goo: 10
Powerful Potion: 34
Power Flower: 84
Powerpack: 6
Twigpile: 24
Tasty Twig: 169

Contact "Elijah"
